message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  How about we split the difference and settle at $137.50?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
Bob, I'm trying to be reasonable here.  $130 is my absolute best offer.  What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $122.50.
